title: Madeleines with lemon curd
description: This recipe for madeleines à la crème au citron was given to me by my friend Frankie Unsworth who, like me, studied pàtisserie at Le Cordon Bleu in Paris. The batter can be made in advance and then baked in time for tea: madeleines should always be eaten fresh from the oven.
ingredients: 1 unwaxed lemon, finely grated zest only
1 unwaxed lemon, finely grated zest and juice only
